Description: Alerts created by log alerts rules and SCOM alerts collected through Alert Management solution.
Audit log for Azure Active Directory. Includes system activity information about user and group management, managed applications, and directory activities.
Metric data emitted by Azure services that measure their health and performance.
Syslog messages using Common Event Format (CEF) streamed from third party products through the Log Analytics Linux agent.
Computer groups that can be used to scope log queries to a set of computers. Includes the computers in each group.
Details and current state of each container.
Log lines collected from stdout and stderr streams for containers.
Details of nodes that serve as container hosts.
Events from Windows Event Log on Windows computers using the Log Analytics agent.
Records logged by Log Analytics agents once per minute to report on agent health.
Performance metrics collected from virtual machines and container infrastructure.
Kubernetes events and their properties.
Events logged by Azure Monitor kubernetes agent for errors and warnings.
Details for nodes that are part of kubernetes cluster.
Kubernetes pods and their properties
Kubernetes services and their properties
Audit logs for Office 365 tenants collected by Azure Sentinel. Currently, only Exchange and SharePoint logs are supported.
Operational log of important activities affecting workspace. Includes both user-initiated activities and notifications from Log Analytics workspace services such as data-capping.
Performance counters from Windows and Linux agents that provide insight into the performance of hardware components, operating systems, and applications.
Alerts that been generated by security products.
Security events collected from windows machines by Azure Security Center or Azure Sentinel.
Sign-in logs for Azure Active Directory. Includes information about the usage of managed applications and user sign-in activities.
Syslog events on Linux computers using the Log Analytics agent.
Details for update schedule run. Includes information such as which updates where available and which were installed.
Summary for each update schedule run. Includes information such as how many updates were not installed.
Hourly usage data for each table in the workspace.
Traffic for open server ports on the monitored machine.
Traffic for inbound and outbound connections to and from monitored computers.
Internet Information Server (IIS) log on Windows computers using the Log Analytics agent.
